document_data.name: Avocado
document_data.mainbody:
'''Avocado''' was the name given to a [[tree]] and its fruit cultivated in the Realms.

{{quote|''I've gotten quite fond of it. It has that rich, buttery flavor. The flavor of revenge.''|[[Alias]] of [[Westgate]]}}
document_data.Description: Avocado fruit was shaped like a pear with dark green skin. Its flesh was of light green color and soft like goo, notably rich and buttery in flavor.
document_data.Availability:
Avocados were grown around [[Imnescar]] in southwestern [[Amn]].

These soft fruits were available on the markets of [[Westgate]] where they sometimes were consumed, smeared on [[bread]].

In [[Cursrah]], [[Calimshan]], avocados were used to create edible dip, accompanied by [[beer]].

The continent of [[Maztica]] had widely cultivated avocado trees.{{Cite dragon/315/Maztica: The New (Fantasy) World|95}}
